Name Gloss
فقر بیماری است
Poverty disease is
Name Transcription
Aliases
Description
Comments

Family
Metaphor Level
Metaphor Type Composed/complex

Cultural Scope
Source Frame بیماری

Target Frame فقر
Roles:


Mappings:


Related Metaphors:


Entailments:


Examples:

Example Text:
فقر ، ذهن ها را مبتلا می کند
poverty minds ra inflict does
Transcription:
English Translation: Poverty inflicts the mind
Provenance:
Annotation:
Comments: The key term is the verb 'mubtala' (inflict) which is used in the context of diseases/illnessess

Examples from linked Linguistic metaphors:
